/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their facades bathed in the soft glow of the daylight. Cars and trucks are scattered along the road, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a striking contrast to the earthy tones of the buildings and vehicles. In the distance, trees can be seen lining the street, their green foliage adding a touch of nature to the urban setting.
